title: Connecting With Coincidence - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/21/19
itunes:title: Connecting With Coincidence - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/21/19
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and psychiatrist Dr. Bernard Beitman explore his research into coincidences in life, if there is  psychic bond between family members, and whether seemingly random events are actually connected.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
